This sweater is very thick and quite warm. It works great as an insulating layer under a jacket. It would be better if it was machine washable, since clothes that are easy to clean and care for are easier to wear.

The ZAFUL Men’s College Pullover Sweater is a stylish and versatile addition to any wardrobe. Featuring a letter print and splicing design, this sweater offers a unique and fashionable look. The long sleeves and comfortable fit make it perfect for casual outings or layering during cooler weather. Its unisex design ensures it can be enjoyed by anyone, making it a great choice for everyday wear.

The ZAFUL Men's College Pullover Sweater is a very nice sweatshirt with big bold printed graphic letters and stripes. The dark maroon color is great with the white print. this fits perfect and is really nice. good quality

This unisex polyester pullover features a soft, breathable, & slightly elastic fabric that is comfortable & skin-friendly, providing warmth in cold weather. Available in multiple sizes (S-2XL), it boasts a trendy college-style design with letter print splicing, a colorblock pattern, & a motorcycle-inspired look. The long-sleeved sweater is perfect for streetwear, casual outings, or various occasions like shopping, parties, & school. Its fashionable color contrast & versatile styling make it an excellent choice for autumn, winter, & spring, easily paired with leggings or jeans. Check it out!

This is a really warm sweater that my husband can wear to work. He needed some warm sweaters and this one fits him great and he said he was warm while working in a warehouse that gets pretty cold. It's just what he needed to add to his wardrobe.
Very rough on the inside against skin. Definitely wear an undershirt to avoid irritation. Perfect sizing. Oversized fit. Nice muted colors.
Very comfortable. Nice winter sweater. True to size. No complaints! Material is also really soft. Ordered a size XL.
Perfect for the cold weather.  I love that the sleeves are actually long enough, my son has long legs and arms. The fabric is soft and thick. Great sweater for men.

So... this sweater is very warm and soft for being knit polyester. It's also machine washable and didn't seem to shrink (but I don't use a high heat setting for either the machine or the dryer). There is no neck tag and the elastics around the bottom hem do keep the sweater from laying flat against your body (it kind of bunches up).  I will say beware the sizing chart, because this sweater is enormously oversized. I have a 45in chest and about 26in shoulder length. So, judging by the hyperlinked sizing chart, I got the XXL. However, the pictured sizing chart is actually closer to the actual dimensions of the XXL: 56 in around the chest/stomach, 28in across the shoulders and 22in sleeve length.  I assume 'length' refers to the shoulder length. So I probably only need a small or medium. So be careful!  I think $30+ is a bit steep for an intentionally baggy brown sweatshirt with nonsense writing on it, but I do think it's comfortable and warm.
These look great. Definitely need more if these.  Very comfortable and fits.

评论概述: Looks Good on Guys or Gals
评论详情: Soft and cozy pullover. Size was good has a bit of give so fit well nice and loose. Fabric is comfortable has slight stretch so fits well on mid body or larger one. Color is as shown print splice is well done is clear and easy to read. Like the fit look and style. Keeps you warm yet doesn't make you all sweaty. Good for casual wear with jeans.
Size: Small  Fits great, feels soft, and keeps you warm, worth the buy.

评论概述: Nice but I worry about cuffs
评论详情: This polyester sweater looks stylish and is of better than average construction. The photo shows how the sweater looks, which is not bad. The sizing is mostly accurate, this is the large size and it is a little larger than expected, which is nice in a sweater since you will expect it to shrink a little from washing. The washing instructions are clear and printed on a tag inside closest to the ribbing at the bottom of the sweater.  The material feels good to the touch and it is not too heavy. Wearing the sweater feels good too, and it is perfect for a cool fall day. The only reservation I have with the sweater is that the ribbed cuffs don’t feel strong enough to stand up over time. Since I don’t have an issue with the ribbed cuffs now, this is just a caution to those who might be hard on cuffs.  I like the sweater and I have added it to my collection of fall sweaters.

Great! The sweater looks exactly as pictured. Fits nicely, has a bit of extra space in it so I’m not too worried about if it shrinks in the wash. Design quality is great, the words are clear and easy to read. Very warm
sweater is made from soft material.  It seems to be a lint magnet because when I took it out of the plastic the front had lint all over it.
It is a lovely sweater however kind of short for a male. My wife claimed it, and it fit great.

But there's nothing wrong with it... it's a sweater for sure - somehow I missed that when I looked at the listing, I thought it was a sweatshirt. But that was my fault- there's absolutely nothing wrong with it as long as you don't make the mistake I made.  It's a sweater!

The ZAFUL Men's College Pullover Sweater is a stylish and comfortable option for casual wear. The letter print design and splicing details give it a trendy, modern look, perfect for adding a bit of flair to your everyday outfits. The material feels soft and comfortable, and the fit is true to size. It's versatile enough to wear casually or when layering for a more stylish look. The long sleeves are perfect for cooler weather, and it’s unisex, which makes it a great option for anyone. My only slight complaint is that the fabric could be a little thicker for added warmth, but overall, it’s a great pullover for the price and a solid addition to any wardrobe!

This is a meeting of two of my favorite styles, aesthetic English (i.e. nonsense) and faux college athletics. I was a bit concerned with the sizing on this guy since there's no real clear guidelines and it's obviously an import, but it is broadly in line with American clothing norms. Maybe a hint small, but it's kind of hard for me to adjust for the curve of sweaters normally being baggy. I got a size smaller than I would normally wear in a shirt, and it's a relatively tight fit, if that's what you're looking for. Major advisory, these do run on the short side, sitting square on my waistband pretty much. If you are taller and/or carry some belly, you may wish to size up or avoid this entirely. But it's soft and I like the styling.

I'm really happy with this sweater.  I got it in the coffee color for my 19 year old son who likes these kind of offbeat styled items: what does "Bang! Stay Strong Anyway" mean?  Who knows.  In any case, the quality level is really solid here.  This sweater has a nice weight and isn't thin or flimsy at all.  It's kind of oversized in my opinion, which is interesting for a top described as unisex.  This one runs big, so keep that in mind.  Overall, though, this is a fun whimsical sweater that's also quite nice.

I recently bought the ZAFUL Men’s College Pullover Sweater, and I’m really impressed with its style and quality! The letter print and splicing design give it a unique look that stands out while still being casual enough for everyday wear. The fabric is soft and warm, making it perfect for cooler days. I love the long sleeves, which add to its cozy feel, and it pairs well with jeans or joggers. If you’re looking for a fashionable and versatile sweater that’s both comfortable and stylish, I highly recommend this one!

Fits great, nice little ugly sweater.  The materials are decent, but it's one ugly sweater.  I guess I can wear it at ugly sweater parties and maybe during indoor winter wear.  But I wouldn't be caught dead wearing this outside in public or in social gatherings.
